page.title: 02THE WINDSURF CHALLENGE.
page.content: Annually since{1982}the{Observer newspaper sponsors a windsurfing race around{Mersea Island.}This takes place in March. The race is 20 miles long. Each year the competitors go round a different way because of the tide and wind .It is a very successful event ,organised by the{Colchester Board {Sailing Association.}It is open to anyone who has the correct equipment.Since 1985 the race has been extended to 500 competitors.They are all allowed to try and beat the record of{1 hour and 8 minutes.}This race is for enjoyment and fun, especially when all the boards are carried across{The Strood}which is the road on to Mersea.Each year a prize for the first woman to finish is awarded as well as the following categories: The overall winner, the record breaker and division winners.
